titleInfo.title: Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers radio show - #157 - WMC

mods.abstract: Slim Rhodes And His Mountaineers (styles as Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers) radio show for WMC-AM, Memphis, Tennessee, sponsored by Mother's Best flour. Listed as show #157 as part of the daily Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers radio show. Mentioned band members include Slim Rhodes, Speck Rhodes, Dusty Rhodes and Danny Holloway. WMC-AM announcer Russ Hodge.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
